scripts.start:admin: concurrently "cd LearnPy_frontend_administrator && npm run dev" "cd LearnPy_backend && python app.py"
scripts.start:user: concurrently "cd LearnPy_frontend_user && npm run dev" "cd LearnPy_backend && python app.py"
scripts.start:all: concurrently "cd LearnPy_frontend_administrator && npm run dev" "cd LearnPy_frontend_user && npm run dev" "cd LearnPy_backend && python app.py"
scripts.install:frontend: npm install --prefix LearnPy_frontend_administrator && npm install --prefix LearnPy_frontend_user
